title: Pay only after you hire
description: No commitment is needed until you make a hire. GrowthX is free for a limited time — no costs even if you hire.

title: Strengthen your employer brand.
description: Showcase your company to a network of ambitious leaders who value meaningful, impactful work environments.

title: Access to projects built by candidates
description: Send projects to your hiring manager to help them evaluate candidates beyond the CV — with real world projects.

title: Engage with talent that cares
description: Our network is built by professionals who proactively invest time and money to excel at their jobs.

title: Experience higher response rates.
description: When you post a role on GrowthX, our members trust the company, getting you responses where other firms can't.

title: Curated for communication & problem solving
description: We rigorously evaluate every single person for 30+ parameters before we accept them to be a GrowthX member.

title: jjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjj for communication & problem solving
